channel.title: Getting first coupple of drops
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Getting first coupple of drops" - is there any low level items that are worth collecting to trade for better stuff

item.title: Re: Getting first coupple of drops
item.content:encoded: Not really, the other "basic" items that trade for monster drops are fairly hard to acquire, and you need lots of em.

item.title: Getting first coupple of drops
item.content:encoded: i have recently started and dont know what low level items to keep for trading and what items to sell off. i read on a lower post that someone traded 350 smokebombs for a regalia so are there any other items worth collecting in mass to trade away?
